results.title: To rename the Red River Valley Agricultural Research Center in Fargo, North Dakota, as the Edward T. Schafer Agricultural Research Center.
results.short_title: To rename the Red River Valley Agricultural Research Center in Fargo, North Dakota, as the Edward T. Schafer Agricultural Research Center.
results.committees: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry Committee
results.latest_major_action: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the House on May 16, 2017. The summary of that version is repeated here.) (Sec. 1) This bill renames the Red River Valley Agricultural Research Center in Fargo, North Dakota, as the "Edward T. Schafer Agricultural Research Center."
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the House on May 16, 2017. The summary of that version is repeated here.) (Sec. 1) This bill renames the Red River Valley Agricultural Research Center in Fargo, North Dakota, as the "Edward T. Schafer Agricultural Research Center."

actions.description: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote. (text: CR H4274)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2154.
Considered under suspension of the rules. (consideration: CR H4274-4275)
Mr. Davis, Rodney moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 48.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Agriculture. H. Rept. 115-125.
Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
